content.raw:
It works well and I like it, but I notice the following:

*  morgan is spamming the console with a lot of requests, I'd like to see if we can silence it for /api
* /api is not my favorite route for documentation, because I assumed it was usually used for the actual api calls (but we're not using it)

  • /api is not my favorite route for documentation, because I assumed it was usually used for the actual api calls (but we're not using it)
